fields.name: hero_image
fields.label: Hero image
fields.description: This will appear in the header of the post.

fields.name: alt
fields.label: Alternate text
fields.description: Use this text to describe the image for humans and robots who can’t see images.

fields.name: caption
fields.label: Caption
fields.description: This text will appear under the image. It shouldn’t be the same as the alternate text.

fields.name: excerpt
fields.label: Excerpt
fields.description: This can appear as a preview summary of the post.

fields.name: external_link
fields.label: External link
fields.description: The URL to the external page this post is about, if applicable.

fields.name: tags
fields.label: Tags
fields.description: Tags are used to display posts related to this post.

fields.name: draft
fields.label: Draft
fields.description: Turn this off to publish the post on the public site. Keep it on to preview the post.

fields.name: image_large
alt
fields.label: Alternate text
fields.description: Use this text to describe the image for humans and robots who can’t see images.

fields.name: caption
fields.label: Caption
fields.description: This text will appear under the image. It shouldn’t be the same as the alternate text. (This isn't being used.)

fields.label: Image
fields.description: An image to appear on the page.

fields.name: image_small
alt
fields.label: Alternate text
fields.description: Use this text to describe the image for humans and robots who can’t see images.

fields.name: caption
fields.label: Caption
fields.description: This text will appear under the image. It shouldn’t be the same as the alternate text. (This isn't being used.)

fields.label: Image (small)
fields.description: A small image to appear below posts.

fields.name: open_linked
fields.label: Open Linked
fields.description: Text to display on external linked pages.

fields.name: archive_link
fields.label: Archive Link
fields.description: Text to display on the link to the archive.

fields.name: copyright
fields.label: Footer
fields.description: Footer content.

fields.name: contact_title
fields.label: Contact title
fields.description: Title above the contact text.

fields.name: contact_text
fields.label: Contact text
fields.description: Call-to-action for contact form.

fields.name: subscribe_intro
fields.label: Subscribe intro text
fields.description: This text introduces the subscription widget.

fields.name: author_name
fields.label: Author name
fields.description: The name of the site’s primary author.

fields.name: lang
fields.label: Language
fields.description: The site's language.

fields.name: timeZone
fields.label: Timezone
fields.description: The timezone used for dates.

fields.name: twitter_handle
fields.label: Twitter handle, used for preview cards
